title: Google Docs adds customizable dropdown menus and table templates
content:
Smart canvas is Google’s push to boost integrations between its family of Workspace apps. In Google Docs, dropdown chips and table templates are the latest additions meant to boost productivity.

more…

The post Google Docs adds customizable dropdown menus and table templates appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: In Google Docs on the web, dropdown chips and table templates are the latest smart canvas additions meant to boost productivity...
